title: Kristen Stewart and Rumored Girlfriend Call It Quits
text:
> News Kristen Stewart and Rumored Girlfriend Call It Quits Kristen Stewart allegedly called it quits with girlfriend, Alicia Cargile. Reportedly Stewart and Cargile still have a lot of love for each other, but Stewart was just too busy for a serious relations iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team!
